title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton, metal strips
Technique: cut supplementary warp pile (velvet) in a plain weave cotton foundation, extra weft floats
description: Five pieces of velvet forming a panel. Elaborate floral groups with leaves and vines in dark green velvet on a yellow and gold background. On face, extra weft floats of yellow silk alternating with metal strips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk, cotton, metal strips
Technique: cut supplementary warp pile (velvet) in a plain weave cotton foundation, extra weft floats. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1967-20-14-a/c.
